issue.title: [R] Namespace dependency 'bit64' is not required
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3668](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3668). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Dependency 'bit64' was added to the R package recently, but that package was not added to the DESCRIPTION file.

This error [was caught on Travis](https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/449082414) but merging the whichever PR added it wasn't blocked because failures in the R build are allowed.
